title: 🇪🇸🇪🇸🇪🇸 Privacy
made
simple
hero.subtitle: Browse, stream and connect with confidence using NymVPN – a decentralized VPN with mixnet functionality for complete privacy. Stay tuned.

features-grid.title: 5-hop novel mixnet
features-grid.text: Splits and encrypts data into smaller packets, which is mixed, rebuilt and decrypted on the receiving side. Cover traffic, time delay, and encryption protects your data and your metadata

features-grid.title: 2-hop secure WireGuard dVPN
features-grid.text: Drop the cover traffic to go light-weight and speedy! The dVPN mode with two hops uses onion encryption and protects your IP address from local adversaries. Not even the VPN app itself will be able to link your communications.

features-grid.title: Unlinkable pathways and no backdoors
features-grid.text: Inability to correlate IPs with network requests by design; No covert access to traffic and private data

features-grid.title: Tor-level privacy and VPN speed in one app
features-grid.text: Unmatched privacy and seamless speed, all within a single application

features-grid.title: Private payments
features-grid.text: Payment method ensuring privacy and concealing user identity for transactions

full-width-banner.title: Real privacy. In your hands.
text: Choose privacy protections based on your browsing needs: Pick lightning-quick speed with the dVPN or complete privacy with the mixnet, all in one app.
High redundancy via the decentralised Nym network.
Nym’s zero-knowledge model and unlinkability means the network holds no user data.

centered-banner.title: Robust security for all your devices
text: Built-in kill switch guarantees comprehensive network security
Support for all major platforms across multiple devices, with one account

comparation-table.title: Digital integrity guaranteed
comparation-table.subtitle: See how NymVPN compares with alternatives

rows.title: Multi-hop
rows.descripton: Traffic routed via at least 2 server hops

rows.title: No traffic correlation
rows.descripton: Impossible to correlate traffic with end users

rows.title: High quality of service
rows.descripton: Servers operators incentivized to provide a high-quality of service

rows.title: Open source
rows.descripton: Software development with publicly accessible source code

mail-collection-banner.title: Be the first to use NymVPN
text: Secure your place on the waitlist or join us on [Discord](https://nymtech.net/go/discord) or [Matrix](https://matrix.to/#/#general:nymtech.chat).

in-numbers.subtitle: Privacy-mixing nodes
in-numbers.text: Experience unparalleled pattern protection – safeguard your metadata against powerful adversaries

in-numbers.subtitle: Exit servers
in-numbers.text: Enjoy a resilient, high-quality network equipped with built-in fail-safes

in-numbers.subtitle: Countries
in-numbers.text: Access our extensive global network spanning Europe, Asia, North America, and South America

reviews.author: Jerry Steward
reviews.text: 🕵️‍♂️ Caught my pet parrot using @NymConnect, today. Now I'm wondering what other secrets he's been squawking about! 🦜🔒 If even my feathered friend values online privacy, you know it's top-notch!

reviews.author: Nathan Barry
reviews.text: 💡 Caught my lightbulb using @NymConnect - it must be plotting some bright ideas in secret! 💡🔒 If even my lightbulb values online privacy, you know it's the illuminating choice! 🤓💡

reviews.author: Bruce Wayne
reviews.text: 🎸 Just found out my guitar uses @NymConnect - it must be composing encrypted melodies! 🎶🔒 If even my musical sidekick values online privacy, you know it's the rockstar's choice! 🎸🤐
